name: Bed In A Field
description:
Xbox360 Controls:

A: Jump

X: Punch

VVV____Unlocked___VVV

B: Bomb 

A: Double Jump (Given by green power up)

(Passive): Water Breathing (Given by blue power up)

Keyboard Controls:

Space: Jump

Left Ctrl: Punch

VVV____Unlocked___VVV

Left Shift: Bomb (Given by orange power up)

Space->Space: Double Jump (Given by green power up)

(Passive): Water Breathing (Given by blue power up)

Special Thanks:

Bryan Harris, Katie Guill and Peter McCarthy
